summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Rainier Avenue, north side only, from Seward Park Avenue to 54th Avenue South; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15625 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
